definition.text: Nodes that are not attached to a hierarchy are not computed. They exist in the workspace, but they don't affect the workings of the system at any level.

paragraphs.text: This means that you may keep as many structures of nodes detached from hierarchies as long as you wish, keeping them at hand for later use, or for whatever reason.

A common scenario is keeping multiple versions of certain definitions while building strategies, so that you may test a set of rules and switch to other rules for the next run. You may even keep multiple versions of entire strategies!
